pluginstrument.author: SIMSTRUMENTATION
pluginstrument.description:
Ambient Light Knob See here for contact info and notes: https://github.com/simstrumentation
This instruement controls the ambient lighting of all CJ4 SIMSTRUMENTATION instruments and more. See User Props for special settings.
This instrument can also be used to set a Philips Hue Light to control lights for realistic dimming. An Arduino is required to send the Philips Hue Lights commands over wifi to the Philips Hue Hub. See https://github.com/simstrumentation for info.
